meanings.definition: The state or condition of not overlapping.
meanings.sent1: The nonoverlappings of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent2: The nonoverlappings of the schedules allowed everyone to attend the meetings.
meanings.sent3: The nonoverlappings of the traffic cones created a funny maze in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The nonoverlappings of the clouds in the sky resembled a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent5: The nonoverlappings of the colors in the painting made it visually striking.

meanings.definition: Instances or occurrences that do not overlap.
meanings.sent1: The nonoverlappings of the events ensured that everyone could participate.
meanings.sent2: The nonoverlappings of the appointments prevented any conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The nonoverlappings of the movie showings led to a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The nonoverlappings of the waves crashing on the shore created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The nonoverlappings of the melodies in the song made it unique and memorable.
